title: GOP Feeling Fascists’ Remorse? HBO Max Crashing On Purpose? 08.29.22
itunes:title: GOP Feeling Fascists’ Remorse? HBO Max Crashing On Purpose? 08.29.22
description:
In episode 1319, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and co-host of The Gay Power Half Hour, Casey Ley, to discuss… GOP Having Trouble Figuring Out If Being Inhumane Is Good Branding…, McDonald’s Play Places Are A Damn Menace, Was House of the Dragon Crashing HBO Max An Accident? And more!

  1. Revealed: leaked video shows Amy Coney Barrett’s secretive faith group drove women to tears
  2. McDonald’s Play Places Are A Damn Menace
  3. Whatever Happened To McDonald's PlayPlaces?
  4. Will the McDonald’s PlayPlace Go Away for Good?
  5. A Mother’s War on Germs at Fast-Food Playlands
  6. Mom Uncovers Filth, Fecal Bacteria, in Some Fast Food Restaurant Kiddie Play Areas
  7. Anti-Germ Crusader Banned By McDonalds
  8. ‘House of the Dragon’ Premiere Crashes HBO Max
  9. 'House of the Dragon' Series Premiere Crashes HBO Max Application on Amazon Devices
  10. Why Are Streaming Platforms Crashing Before Popular Finales?
  11. Sold-out Products Influence Consumer Choice

LISTEN: Break My Soul (DJ Yamsha's Taboo 2 Remix) by Beyoncé

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
